Has this been implemented in a way I can't figure out? I found this in the archives: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/33987-Action-Groups-for-Fuel-Tanks which was my exact question. I want to ensure my launch phase doesn't eat the propellent on my rover or lander, which means every launch attempt I have to shut off 10 tanks before liftoff. Would be glorious if there was a way to do that such that it either remembers I turned them off between launches, or it's part of an action group.

There may well be an addon for this, but I'm sticking to the stock game for a bit until I learn it a bit better.

Cheers!
